title: SimCity.Repack - R.G.Mechanics
description:
SimCity.Repack - R.G.Mechanics

Year: 2013
Genre: Strategy 
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language:Eng  | Rus
Voice Language:Eng 
Crack: Razor1911

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP (32-Bit), Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000 + or higher, 
Intel Core 2 Duo 2 GHz or higher
Memory: 2 GB
Video: 256 MB compatible with Shader third model 
(ATI Radeon HD 2600 or better, NVIDIA 7800 or better, 
Intel HD Graphics or better)
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 3.5 GB

Description:

Town-planning simulator with you again! Create the city of your dreams; 
make the right choices in life your characters! Each solution has real consequences. 
Invest in heavy industry, and your capital increase - but at the expense of the 
health of your characters, as it will degrade the environment. Implement 
environmentally friendly technology and improve the quality of your characters, 
at the risk of higher taxes and unemployment. Unite with friends to solve global 
issues: space shuttle launch, reducing radioactive emissions or built an 
amusement park. Vying for the title of the richest, most dirty, or the best 
place in the international and regional leaderboards!

Repack Features 

SimCity
Game Version - v1.10
Do not cut / recoded

Additions:
Cities Of Tomorrow Expansion Pack
